data.title: Planned Water Maintenance - Ward 12
data.content: We will be conducting scheduled water maintenance in Ward 12 from 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM. Water supply will be temporarily interrupted. Please store water for your needs during this period.
data.author: Water Department

data.title: Public Holiday Service Changes
data.content: During the upcoming public holiday, municipal offices will be closed. Emergency services remain operational 24/7. Normal operations resume the following business day.
data.author: Administration
